query:
WITH old AS (
              SELECT id, status
              FROM mods
              WHERE id = $2
            ),
            updated AS (
              UPDATE mods
              SET status = $1
              FROM threads t
              WHERE
                mods.id = $2
                AND t.mod_id = mods.id
              RETURNING mods.id, t.id AS thread_id
            )
            SELECT
              updated.thread_id AS "thread_id: DBThreadId",
              old.status AS "old_status!"
            FROM updated
            INNER JOIN old ON old.id = updated.id
